properties.contents:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<server description="new server">

    <!-- Enable features -->
    <featureManager>
        <feature>webProfile-8.0</feature>
    </featureManager>
    
    <variable name="default.http.port" defaultValue="9080"/>
    <variable name="default.https.port" defaultValue="9443"/>

    <!-- To access this server from a remote client add a host attribute to the following element, e.g. host="*" -->
    <httpEndpoint host="*" httpPort="${default.http.port}" 
        httpsPort="${default.https.port}" id="defaultHttpEndpoint"/>

    <!-- Automatically expand WAR files and EAR files -->
    <applicationManager autoExpand="true"/>

</server>

propDefs.name: argocd.server
propDefs.label: argocd.server
propDefs.description: The name or IP address of the Argo CD server to login to.

propDefs.name: argocd.user
propDefs.label: argocd.user
propDefs.description: The username of an account to authenticate.

propDefs.name: argocd.password
propDefs.label: argocd.password
propDefs.description: The password of an account to authenticate.

propDefs.name: argocd.application.name
propDefs.label: argocd.application.name
propDefs.description: The name of the Argo CD application.

propDefs.name: argocd.global.flags
propDefs.label: argocd.global.flags
propDefs.description: Global flags that should be applied to all commands, such as --config=../argocd.config

propDefs.name: argocd.cmd.path
propDefs.label: argocd.cmd.path
propDefs.description: The name of the argocd command if it is in the system path or the full path to run the argocd command.

components.name: CP4A-OpenLiberty-System-Microservice-LO
components.description: An example container that deploys to OpenShift using the OpenLiberty Operator

processes.name: Deploy-Container-to-OpenShift-using-Operator
processes.description: This process deploys the container to an OCP Kube Cluster

edges.from: OpenShift Login and Display OpenShift Details

edges.to: OpenShift Login and Display OpenShift Details

offsets.name: OpenShift Login and Display OpenShift Details

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
oc login --token ${p:environment/oc-auth-token} --server=https://c117-e.us-south.containers.cloud.ibm.com:30443
echo "I am user ${id}"
echo "My home directory is $HOME"
oc project rlange
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo "Pods running in this namespace are" 
oc get pods

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

children.name: OpenShift Login and Display OpenShift Details

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
#docker login quay.io -u "rslangehennig0" -p "S/8YMG1bPu2ozRPe75sOMM8LdD6leVOoxBSsyqA6HhmOO2x0R7s1ZTI/GPX14oix"
docker login -u='rslangehennig0' -p='ohVuF8Mdw6MOsp4jT6AEH/+nb7efGiyAPGWcc3Qu5gYDSMpcnnuqUsCwnfoDxqYYhReSXOOXn68TIufLBUrXmg==' quay.io
#oc apply --namespace=rlange -f yaml-for-deployment/liberty-deployment.yaml
oc apply --namespace=rlange -f deploy-operator.yaml

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
touch deploy-operator.yaml
echo "apiVersion: openliberty.io/v1beta1
kind: OpenLibertyApplication
metadata:
  name: openliberty-system-microservice-cp4a
spec:
  replicas: 1
  applicationImage: quay.io/rslangehennig0/openliberty-system-microservice-cp4a:@BUILDTAG@
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 9080
  expose: true" >> deploy-operator.yaml
  
  cat deploy-operator.yaml

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
oc project rlange
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo "Pods running in this namespace are" 
oc get pods
